title: The app store says my phone is set in the wrong region, and I can't download apps
content: I'm trying to download apps for local services (eg. home wifi provider app), and the app store tells me either that it's incompatible with my device, or that it isn't available in my region. I've contacted my provider, who says there's nothing they can do - it's an issue google will need to resolve
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
